info.name: Recipes App API
info.description: Complete CRUD API for managing recipes with comprehensive documentation and sample requests.

request.description: Create a new recipe with complete details including ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
Create another sample recipe - Margherita Pizza
Create sample recipe - Chicken Tikka Masala
Retrieve all recipes with pagination support. Query parameters are optional.
Retrieve a single recipe by its MongoDB ObjectId. Replace the ID in the URL with an actual recipe ID from the database.
Update one or more fields of an existing recipe. You can send only the fields you want to update. Replace the ID with an actual recipe ID.
Delete a recipe by its MongoDB ObjectId. This action cannot be undone. Replace the ID with an actual recipe ID.
Search for recipes filtered by cuisine type. Try different cuisines like Italian, Indian, etc.
Search for recipes filtered by tags. Try different tags like quick, vegetarian, easy, etc.
